name: uppishly
content:
Add to word list

sports
  specialized In cricket, if a player hits a ball uppishly, they hit it in an upward direction, making it easier to catch: drive uppishly He drove uppishly at a delivery from the fast bowler and was caught out. He took a simple catch when the opening batsman cut uppishly at a deliberate short, wide ball from James Anderson.
